senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>расшаркиваться</w>.

examples.text: Старик, долго <w>расшаркивавшийся</w> перед дамой, выглядел немного смешно и старомодно.

target_lang_translations.en: The old man, who had been <w>bowing and scraping</w> before the lady for a long time, looked a bit ridiculous and old-fashioned.

examples.text: Этот сотрудник, вечно <w>расшаркивавшийся</w> перед директором, никого не удивил своим поведением.

target_lang_translations.en: This employee, who was always <w>fawning</w> over the director, surprised no one with his behavior.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb meaning to bow while scraping one's foot; figuratively, to behave in an overly polite or obsequious manner.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: performing a deferential bow; acting obsequiously
acting in an obsequious manner in order to obtain someone's forgiveness or favor
